channel.title: Jennifer Connelly – deadbadger.net
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: Great Eyebrows of our Time
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: Most people subjected to my conversation over the last few years will have come away with the impression that I’m obsessed to an almost monomaniacal extent with beards. This may not be an entirely false impression, but never let it be said I don’t let my interests branch out. Today I would like to draw Continue reading →
item.p: Most people subjected to my conversation over the last few years will have come away with the impression that I’m obsessed to an almost monomaniacal extent with beards. This may not be an entirely false impression, but never let it be said I don’t let my interests branch out. Today I would like to draw Continue reading →
